synopsis.text:
She may appear to be an ordinary student at Saint Terejia Academy, but Little Licca-chan is far from it. Unbeknownst to her, she hails from a royal lineage of the enchanting Doll Kingdom, a realm that serves as the origin of all fairy tales. As the rightful princess, Licca becomes a target for the nefarious Professor Scarecrow and his loyal minions, who seek to exploit her connection to the kingdom for their own sinister purposes.

Fortunately, Licca is not left to face this threat alone. Her grandmother bestows upon her a set of magical dolls that transform into the valiant Doll Knights when summoned by a calling ring. Together with her friends and family, Licca must learn to harness the power of these super-powered dolls to safeguard her throne and thwart the malevolent schemes of Professor Scarecrow. Embark on a magical journey filled with adventure, friendship, and courage in this captivating anime that explores the true strength that lies within us all.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
